content:
What a great request! I'd be happy to recommend some restaurants that offer yudofu with a nice view or atmosphere near your hotel in Kyoto.

Since you didn't mention the specific location of your hotel, I'll provide a few recommendations in different areas of Kyoto. Please let me know if any of these are near your hotel or if you'd like more options:

**Gion Area**

1. **Gion Nanba** (): This Michelin-starred restaurant, which I mentioned earlier, offers a beautiful view of the Gion district while you enjoy their exquisite yudofu course. (Approx. ¥2,000 - ¥5,000 per person)
2. **Yuzuya** (): A tranquil restaurant with a serene garden view, serving traditional Kyoto-style yudofu in a peaceful atmosphere. (Approx. ¥1,500 - ¥3,000 per person)

**Arashiyama Area**

1. **Yudofu Sagano** (): This cozy, family-run restaurant I mentioned earlier has a lovely view of the surrounding Arashiyama mountains and serves delicious yudofu. (Approx. ¥1,000 - ¥2,000 per person)
2. **Tofuya Ukai** (): A historic restaurant with a beautiful garden and a peaceful atmosphere, offering a variety of tofu dishes, including yudofu. (Approx. ¥1,500 - ¥3,000 per person)

**Kawaramachi Area**

1. **Kyubey Gion** (): While not directly in Kawaramachi, this renowned sushi restaurant has a beautiful view of the Kamo River and offers yudofu as part of their omakase course. (Approx. ¥2,000 - ¥5,000 per person)
2. **Tofu Kichi** (): A modern tofu restaurant with a stylish atmosphere, offering a variety of tofu dishes, including yudofu, and a great view of the city. (Approx. ¥1,000 - ¥2,500 per person)

Please note that prices may vary depending on the season and menu choices. Reservations are highly recommended, especially for popular restaurants with nice views.

If none of these options are near your hotel, please let me know your hotel's location, and I'll be happy to provide more tailored recommendations!
